issues.title: Medicare for All
issues.description: Universal single-payer healthcare system eliminating private health insurance, providing comprehensive medical coverage for all Americans

issues.title: Green New Deal
issues.description: Comprehensive climate change policy targeting 100% renewable energy by 2030, massive infrastructure investment, and creating millions of green jobs

issues.title: Free Public College
issues.description: Eliminate tuition and student debt at public colleges and universities, making higher education accessible to all Americans

issues.title: $15 Minimum Wage
issues.description: Gradually raise federal minimum wage to $15 per hour, indexed to median wage growth

issues.title: Immigration Reform
issues.description: Path to citizenship for undocumented immigrants, protect DACA recipients, end family separations and private detention centers

issues.title: Wealth Tax
issues.description: Annual tax on wealth over $32 million, generating revenue to fund social programs and reduce income inequality

issues.title: Criminal Justice Reform
issues.description: End mass incarceration, eliminate private prisons, legalize marijuana, restore voting rights to felons

issues.title: Foreign Policy
issues.description: Reduce military spending, oppose interventionist wars, support diplomatic solutions, strengthen international cooperation
